channel.title: .jag files
channel.description:
Hey,
I'm trying to make my own client for my hopefully huge new kind of RS private server... But all of the images used inside the client are .jag files and i have no idea how to create these, But ultimately i want to convert .png's into .jag files.
Anyone know how?
Thanks, Dave.

item.title: .jag files
item.dc:creator: @Fat_Cookies Fat Cookies
item.description:
@Fat_Cookies wrote:

Open up notepad and type the following:

 ren *.png *.jag

Then click Save As and go to the folder were all your png files are stored. Now change “Text File” to “All Files” and name the file png2jag.bat and click save.
After this you simply double click on the png2jag file and all the files will be converted into the jag format.

Read full topic
